From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine knew from Foxfingers advanced recon aproximately where the
defenses were. The half wolf transformed to full beast mode and rolled to
cover. His sense of smell alerted him to the advancing Bat probes. He opened
into a full sprint catapulting himself over several of the shots opening his
mouth wide intending to bite down hard on the probes. There were more than
he'd origionally calculated as the probes spread out in a formation to wide
for the wolf to take out in one blow. Shots hit Lunarpine but the low level
weaponry posed little more than a sting to the adrenaline pushed wolf. Even
he knew though that even though a single sting could do little harm an
entire hive could incapacitate even the largest animal.
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 03, 2001 4:39 PM
Subject: Re: Outside the Black fortress.


> External Blackfortress's defences/8 bat-probes:
>
> In spite of Lunarpine's dampner BlackFortress's computer could detect
> him and open fire against him.
>
> The eight Bat probes open fire against Lunarpine too (5 shoots x bat-
> probe)
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lunarpine continued advancing on the Black fortress. Remaining in
> his half wolf form he smelled around knowing that either the Preds
> had another way out or they were trapped inside. His idea was to find
> it and direct the others out. His dampner was still active making him
> invisable to scanners. He knew that the only way he'd be seen is
> direct contact. Since he could smell a bot coming from a couple miles
> away he wasn't worried about getting caught.
>
>
>
